header.para: Error XS9006Illegal combination of commandline options:

body.para: This error is produced for illegal combinations of commandline options. For example the fox2 command line option MUST be used in the FoxPro dialect and in combination with the memvar commandline option. When one of these two options is not specified you will see the error message:
error XS9006: Illegal combination of commandline options: /fox2 must be combined with the FoxPro dialect and /memvars.
